title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and cook until tender.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. Top with croutons and parmesan.

title: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa and let it cool. Mix with vegetables, feta, and olives. Dress with lemon juice.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add mushrooms and rice. Gradually stir in broth until rice is cooked. Finish with parmesan.

title: Greek Yogurt Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

title: Baked Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and dill. Bake with lemon slices on top until cooked through.

title: Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Cut sweet potatoes into fries. Toss with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper. Bake until crispy.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté chicken with garlic. Make Alfredo sauce with cream, butter, and parmesan. Combine all.

title: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery. Add potatoes, tomatoes, and broth. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk, egg, and melted butter. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer tomatoes and mozzarella. Top with basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

title: Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix tuna with mayonnaise, celery, onion, and pickles. Serve over lettuce.

title: Lentil Chili
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add lentils, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer until lentils are tender.

title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Toss with pasta and parmesan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms with onion and garlic. Stir in sour cream and beef broth. Serve over noodles.

title: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix chickpeas with vegetables and feta. Dress with lemon vinaigrette.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook linguine. Sauté shrimp with garlic in butter. Toss with linguine, lemon, and parsley.

title: Baked Ziti
instructions: Cook ziti. Mix with marinara, ricotta, and mozzarella. Bake until bubbly.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix ingredients and drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet. Bake until golden.

title: Beef Burgers
instructions: Form beef into patties and grill. Serve on buns with lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, and ketchup.

title: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a pot. Simmer until flavors meld.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Sauté shrimp in garlic butter. Finish with parsley and lemon juice.

title: Crispy Chicken Wings
instructions: Toss wings in flour and seasoning. Bake until crispy.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Stuff peppers with a mixture of beef, rice, and onion. Top with tomato sauce and cheese. Bake until peppers are tender.

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer, then blend. Stir in cream and basil.

title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry chicken. Top with marinara sauce and cheese. Bake until cheese is melted.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast and top with red pepper flakes.

title: Chicken Quesadillas
instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken, cheese, and vegetables. Cook in a skillet until cheese is melted and tortillas are crispy.

title: Tom Yum Soup
instructions: Simmer lemongrass, lime leaves, and chili paste. Add shrimp and mushrooms. Season with fish sauce and lime juice.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant slices. Layer with marinara sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

title: Pulled Pork Sandwiches
instructions: Slow cook pork until tender. Shred and mix with BBQ sauce. Serve on buns with coleslaw.

title: Balsamic Glazed Chicken
instructions: Sauté chicken with garlic and rosemary. Glaze with balsamic vinegar and honey until reduced.

title: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Toss with pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan.

title: Mango Salsa
instructions: Mix diced mango with red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and jalapeño.

title: Clam Chowder
instructions: Cook bacon and vegetables. Add clams, potatoes, and cream. Simmer until thickened.

title: Buffalo Wings
instructions: Toss wings in hot sauce and butter. Bake or fry until crispy. Serve with celery and ranch dressing.

title: Churros
instructions: Mix dough and pipe into strips. Fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon sugar.

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas with spices and onion. Form into balls and fry until golden.

title: Garlic Parmesan Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in butter. Toss pasta with garlic, parmesan, and parsley.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fry chicken and vegetables. Add rice and soy sauce. Stir in beaten egg and cook until set.

title: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Stir-fry beef with garlic and ginger. Add broccoli and soy sauce. Thicken with cornstarch.

title: Lemon Bars
instructions: Make crust with flour, sugar, and butter. Bake. Mix filling with eggs and lemon juice. Pour over crust and bake until set. Dust with powdered sugar.

title: Cucumber Mint Salad
instructions: Combine sliced cucumber with mint, lemon juice, and olive oil. Season with salt.

title: Chicken Enchiladas
instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken and onion. Roll up and place in a baking dish. Top with enchilada sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

title: Pear and Gorgonzola Salad
instructions: Toss mixed greens with sliced pears, crumbled gorgonzola, and walnuts. Dress with balsamic vinaigrette.

title: Pork Schnitzel
instructions: Bread and fry pork chops. Serve with lemon wedges and parsley.

title: Zucchini Noodles
instructions: Sauté zucchini noodles with garlic in olive oil. Toss with cherry tomatoes and parmesan.
